name: colony genesis 1.0.0-alpha
description:
Establish a new colony and help it grow or let it develop on its own.

  • Procedurally generated world
  • Day/night cycle and weather
  • Temperature, humidity, and fluid simulation
  • Multiple food sources including aphid and fungus harvesting
  • 6 castes governing ant behavior and attributes
  • Compete against a rival colony

ASCII graphics + audio runs on 64-bit Windows and Linux from terminal/console.

Note this project is currently in alpha. Please use the discussion board or discord to report any issues.
